## Node.clone() function

Creates a new `Text` instance with the same value as the original and referentially non-equal.

**Signature:**

```typescript
function clone(node: Text, options?: ElementReplacementOptions, device?: Device): Text;
```

</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Text

## Remarks

The clone will have the same `externalId` as the original. The clone will \*not\* get `extraData` from the original, instead it will be `undefined`<!-- -->.
